text: Sakuya, is there anything you're not good at?

Hehe, what happens after I answer thatâ€”...
It's kind of a scary question.

But, honestly, Sakuya doesn't seem to have many weaknesses,
does she? She seems to handle things smartly.

Well... then, Producer,
please tell us what you're not good at!

Were you plotting something...?
You shouldn't prank too much.

Hehe, being told not to do something
only makes me want to do it more.

Oh, are you being confident?
Hehe, it's a chance to show off, huh?

I'll think about it for a bit,
so please surprise me when I least expect it.

Oh, this is unexpected.
As expected of the Producer...

Well, I guess being not good at something
has nothing to do with being a Producer...
